title: Phillips Digial VoiceTracer
description:
Phillips Digital Voice Tracer Download Manager

I spent a long time trying to find this, and when I finally did, I figured I should share it and save others some time.

I mainly got this to play/convert ZVR files.  This will convert ZVR to WAV, or play ZVR direct.

I've used this on Windows 7 64-bit, and it works fine.  (didn't try it with acutal device though, only with zvr file playback and conversion)

Enjoy!

--------------------------

Readme:

------------------------------------------------------------------
                           README.TXT                           
         Digital Voice Tracer Download Manager Version 3.2 and 3.7
                   Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/Vista

                          May 2007
------------------------------------------------------------------
(c)Copyright Philips Austria GmbH, Philips Speech Processing, 2007
------------------------------------------------------------------

This file contains last minute information on Digital VoiceTracer
Download Manager software.

Note that this may overrule information in the Online Help.

CONTENTS
========
1.  Installing Digital Voice Tracer Download manager
2.  Problems solved in this build
3.  Known problems
4.  Known limitations

1. Installing Digital Voice Tracer Download manager
===================================================
The Digital Voice Tracer Download manager comes with an Autorun.EXE. 
Start the installation by selecting "Setup" and follow 
the instructions given by the Wizard.

2.  Problems solved in this version
=================================
- Moving files
  The download manager software can now move MP3 files, recorded on the 
  Digital Voice Tracer, back to a voice folder (A, B, C, D) on the device.

  The previous version could only move MP3 files, recorded on the device,
  back to the Music (M) folder. This version solves this problem.

- Download Manager Window view
  When maximizing and then minimizing the window of download manager the 
  icons of the lower bar disapeared and could not be made visible again. 

- Windows Vista compatibility
  Versions 3.2 and 3.7 are compatible with Windows Vista. 

3. Known problems
=================
- Moving files
  A Download Manager warning message stating 

  `Uploading/Downloading/Formatting now!!!Ã‚Â´

  might appear when moving files, for example in MP3 format, from the PC
  to the VoiceTracer when running virus scanner software, such as from
  www.ikarus-software.at, at the same time.

  WORKAROUND:
  Select the first file, move it to the Voice Tracer and wait till it 
  has been uploaded completely before moving the next file.

  Alternatively you can also use the Microsoft Explorer to move files
  from the PC to the Voice Tracer.

4. Known limitations
====================
-  Devices with lower serial numbers than listed bellow, are not supported with Download Manager Version 2.0 and higer.
   These Devices work with the Download Manager 1.95 Version and are not compatible to Windows Vista.

7650/7650x	 (S/N: 006401 ~)	 
7670	         (S/N: 021301 ~)	 
7680	         (S/N: 007901 ~)
